attributes.action: Save our children centres and staff
attributes.additional_details: Blurton children centre helps family who need the support gives adults a easy guide in life to work and gives our children education we need this saving its the only place where we can take our children play in the community we no all the staff so do the children and they are loosing there jobs its very upsetting for them and the children making our children unstable after they got to no the staff please help us save our children centre
attributes.background: The children centre is for our childrens education and our adults to we need help saving them hundreds of staff have lost there jobs to build a car park
